Comment.value:
Subclasses

Subclasses allow players to modify their characters, while retaining the appearance of their normal race.

How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.


Acrobat

Syntax: Acrobat

Ability Bonus: +4 Dexterity +2 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Dodge



Crusader

Syntax: Crusader

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Power Attack



Dragon Slayer

Syntax: Dragon-slayer

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Exotic Weapon Proficiency



Gypsy

Syntax: Gypsy

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Blind Fight



Hunter 

Syntax: Hunter

Abilities: +4 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Keen Sense



Jester

Syntax: Jester

Stats: +4 Dexterity, +2 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Mobility



Knight

Syntax: Knight

Stats: +4 Strength, +2 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Power Attack



Larcenist

Syntax: Larcenist

Ability Bonus: +4 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence

Feat Bonus: Skill Focus: Open Lock



Meathead

Syntax: Meathead

Ability Bonus: +4 Strength, +2 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Toughness



Minstrel

Syntax: Minstrel

Stats: +2 Dexterity, +4 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Artist



Pagan

Syntax: Pagan

Stats: +2 Dexterity, +4 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Combat Casting



Paragon - For those who enjoy playing pure classes.

Syntax: Paragon

Class Restrictions: Paragon's are limited to pure normal classes or 50 of a single prestige classes (you are free to choose the other 10 levels).

Stats: All abilities are set to 20, this occurs BEFORE any racial bonuses.



Sage

Syntax: Sage

Ability Bonus: +4 Wisdom, +2 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Courteous Magocracy



Scholar

Syntax: Scholar

Abilities: +4 Intelligence. +2 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Combat Casting



Swashbuckler

Syntax: Swashbuckler

Stats: +4 Dexterity, +2 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Weapon Finesse

Subclasses

Subclasses allow players to modify their characters, while retaining the appearance of their normal race.

How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntaxprompt below.


Acrobat

Syntax: Acrobat

Ability Bonus: +4 Dexterity +2 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Dodge



Crusader

Syntax: Crusader

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Power Attack



Dragon Slayer

Syntax: Dragon-slayer

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Exotic Weapon Proficiency



Gypsy

Syntax: Gypsy

Stats: +2 Strength, +4 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Blind Fight



Hunter 

Syntax: Hunter

Abilities: +4 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Keen Sense

Feat Bonus: Mobility

Feat Bonus: Power Attack

Feat Bonus: Skill Focus: Open Lock



Meathead

Ability Bonus: +4 Strength, +2 Constitution

Feat Bonus: Toughness



Minstrel

Syntax: Minstrel

Stats: +2 Dexterity, +4 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Artist



Pagan

Syntax: Pagan

Stats: +2 Dexterity, +4 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Combat Casting



Paragon - For those who enjoy playing pure classes.

Syntax: Paragon

Class Restrictions: Paragon's are limited to pure normal classes or 50 of a single prestige classes (you are free to choose the other 10 levels).

Stats: All abilities are set to 20, this occurs BEFORE any racial bonuses.



Sage

Syntax: Sage

Ability Bonus: +4 Wisdom, +2 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Courteous Magocracy



Scholar

Syntax: Scholar

Abilities: +4 Intelligence. +2 Wisdom

Feat Bonus: Combat Casting



Swashbuckler

Syntax: Swashbuckler

Stats: +4 Dexterity, +2 Charisma

Feat Bonus: Weapon Finesse
